title: Introduction to HTML
description: Learn the basics of HTML and create your first web page
content: Welcome to the first lesson! In this lesson, you'll learn about HTML structure, tags, elements, and how to create a basic web page. HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages.

title: CSS Fundamentals
description: Style your web pages with CSS
content: Learn how to make your websites beautiful with CSS. We'll cover selectors, properties, the box model, flexbox, and responsive design.

title: JavaScript Basics
content: Discover the power of JavaScript! Learn variables, functions, loops, and how to manipulate the DOM to create interactive web experiences.
